title: Textile, "Collection: Africa II", 1963
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 330.8 x 142.2 cm (10 ft. 10 1/4 in. x 56 in.) selvedge to selvedge
Repeat H x W: 92.1 x 123.8 cm (36 1/4 x 48 3/4 in.) straight repeat
description: Bold pattern in bright blue, black, ochre, warm and cool neutrals of irregular shapes and sizes each patterned by small-scale all-over patterns which include bamboo, leaves, stripes, grids, and interlaces. The overall effect resembles swags and drapery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Collection: Africa II", 1963.
1963. Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed. Gift of Jack Lenor Larsen. 1973-54-3.
